tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterUsageRestrictions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  government_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  restriction_level INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_restrictions (
\tid INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_id INT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	restriction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    government_id INT NOT NULL,
    household_id INT NOT NULL,
    usage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    date_recorded DATE NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_government FOREIGN KEY (government_id) REFERENCES local_governments(id)
);

CREATE TABLE water_restrictions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    government_id INT NOT NULL,
    restriction_level INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_restriction FOREIGN KEY (government_id) REFERENCES local_governments(id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsers (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    authority_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (authority_id) REFERENCES WaterAuthorities(authority_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    usage_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES WaterUsers(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterConsumption (
  consumer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  consumption_amount FLOAT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WaterRestrictions (
  restriction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  restriction_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  is_resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Inspectors (
  inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
  inspector_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  notification_type VARCHAR(50),
  recipient_id INT,
  content TEXT,
  is_read BOOLEAN
)
